Invocation Name: rax smart home
des:
Rax Smart Home skill lets you control all your BMS devices through voice.
First, you need to use the Bms app for IOS or Android to connect your Bms device to your home wifi network and give them distinct names. Once done, head to the Smart Home section in the Alexa app, select "Enable Smart Home Skills", search for Rax Smarthome skill, and press "Enable Skill". 

Once your Rax account is verified and linked to your Alexa profile, you can discover your devices by saying, “Alexa, discover my devices” or running a device discovery in the Smart Home screen of the Alexa app.

To control your devices, say “Alexa turn on/off my <device name>”.

Here are some of trivial phrases to get started:
“Alexa, turn on kitchen light”
“Alexa, status of kitchen light”
"Alexa, turn off hall light 1"

PREREQUISITES
Bms Control devices should be installed and configured.
Amazon accounts for Account Linking. Amazon account should be the same as your Bms account.
